com.edmodo.cropper.cropwindow.edge

Enum Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Edge>
      • com.edmodo.cropper.cropwindow.edge.Edge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Edge>

    public enum Edge
extends java.lang.Enum<Edge>
    Enum representing an edge in the crop window.

      • values

        public static Edge[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Edge c : Edge.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • valueOf

        public static Edge valueOf(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the enum constant to be returned.

      • setCoordinate

        public void setCoordinate(float coordinate)
        Sets the coordinate of the Edge. The coordinate will represent the x-coordinate for LEFT and RIGHT Edges and the y-coordinate for TOP and BOTTOM edges.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the position of the edge

      • offset

        public void offset(float distance)
        Add the given number of pixels to the current coordinate position of this Edge.
        Parameters:
        distance - the number of pixels to add

      • getCoordinate

        public float getCoordinate()
        Gets the coordinate of the Edge
        Returns:
        the Edge coordinate (x-coordinate for LEFT and RIGHT Edges and the y-coordinate for TOP and BOTTOM edges)

      • adjustCoordinate

        public void adjustCoordinate(float x,
                             float y,
                             RectF imageRect,
                             float imageSnapRadius,
                             float aspectRatio)
        Sets the Edge to the given x-y coordinate but also adjusting for snapping to the image bounds and parent view border constraints.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate
        y - the y-coordinate
        imageRect - the bounding rectangle of the image
        imageSnapRadius - the radius (in pixels) at which the edge should snap to the image

      • adjustCoordinate

        public void adjustCoordinate(float aspectRatio)
        Adjusts this Edge position such that the resulting window will have the given aspect ratio.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - the aspect ratio to achieve

      • isNewRectangleOutOfBounds

        public boolean isNewRectangleOutOfBounds(Edge edge,
                                         RectF imageRect,
                                         float aspectRatio)
        Returns whether or not you can re-scale the image based on whether any edge would be out of bounds. Checks all the edges for a possibility of jumping out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        edge - the Edge that is about to be expanded
        imageRect - the rectangle of the picture
        aspectRatio - the desired aspectRatio of the picture
        Returns:
        whether or not the new image would be out of bounds.

      • snapToRect

        public float snapToRect(RectF imageRect)
        Snap this Edge to the given image boundaries.
        Parameters:
        imageRect - the bounding rectangle of the image to snap to
        Returns:
        the amount (in pixels) that this coordinate was changed (i.e. the new coordinate minus the old coordinate value)

      • snapOffset

        public float snapOffset(RectF imageRect)
        Returns the potential snap offset of snapToRect, without changing the coordinate.
        Parameters:
        imageRect - the bounding rectangle of the image to snap to
        Returns:
        the amount (in pixels) that this coordinate was changed (i.e. the new coordinate minus the old coordinate value)

      • getWidth

        public static float getWidth()
        Gets the current width of the crop window.

      • getHeight

        public static float getHeight()
        Gets the current height of the crop window.

      • isOutsideMargin

        public boolean isOutsideMargin(RectF rect,
                               float margin)
        Determines if this Edge is outside the inner margins of the given bounding rectangle. The margins come inside the actual frame by SNAPRADIUS amount; therefore, determines if the point is outside the inner "margin" frame.
